name: swagger-node-runner
description: This project is a fork of swagger-node-runner: https://github.com/apigee-127/swagger-node-runner.git
author: Scott Ganyo <sganyo@apigee.com>

scripts.test: node node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -u exports -R spec test test/lib test/fittings
scripts.coverage: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -u exports -R spec test test/lib test/fittings
scripts.coveralls: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec test test/lib test/fittings && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js --verbose
